title: Health Nut Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ['95g plain flour', '90g wholemeal flour', '150g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons oat bran', '4 tablespoons porridge oats', '4 tablespoons wheat germ', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarb of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '150g blueberries', '60g chopped walnuts', '1 banana, mashed', '250ml buttermilk', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
